website_summaries.verdict: A customer favorite, these pants impress with their high-quality construction and comfortable material.
pros: Customers appreciate the product's exceptionally high waist
Crafted with a barrel cinch waist for proper fit
Stretch materials allows for easy, flexible movement
cons: The correct sizing chart is a little hard to find

customer_reviews.title: Good fit that keeps me warm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and a jacket for doing water aerobics in a pool with temperatures ranging from 54 to 62 degrees. I’m 5 feet tall and wear a 14 to 16 pants and was unsure of what size to order. After reading all the reviews, I settled on a medium. The pants fit perfectly. There’s a lot of stretch. I like the fact that they fit high above the waist and at the back. I wore them for the first time today and was comfortable in the water for 40 minutes. The fit allowed for maximum movement and I was able to do my entire exercise routine. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Piercey

customer_reviews.title: The BOMB!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BOMB! Perfect fit, perfect stretch, so comfortable. I have another "off" brand of wetsuit pants and they scrunch up in front, I think they're too long in the rise, and I'm always hiking them up. These fit perfectly! They come up high in the back so when I kneel on the paddle board, they don't come down either. So glad I found them. I went by the measurements on the size chart to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Zafira Daima

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Perfect for taking the chill off in Spring/Summer
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I'll be using these for kayaking and can tell they will fit my needs well. I kayak fish off La Jolla year around and these should work well along with a splash top for 8 months out of the year (water temps 64-74deg, air 60-80deg), and in the winter months (water temps 55-60 deg, air 60-65 deg) along with waders and a light (3mm) wet suit jacket. They should be perfect for taking the chill off without becoming excessively hot or constraining. I'm 6ft 170lbs and the larger fit me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: It is best to order this product your size or a little ...
customer_reviews.text: It is best to order this product your size or a little smaller. It works best when it fits properly or a little small. If it is too large then it doesn't perform as designed. I ordered larger at first due to my large belly - that wasn't necessary - I have a 38" waist and weigh about 215 - started with XXL, went to XL, but L is the best fit. Use their charts but do not put a lot of emphasis on your belly size if you are a man ...
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Woman's Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to add to our water sport gear. They are unisex and the large is about a 10/12 ladies size, very stretchy and would probably work for people close to that size. Very comfortable and great for coolish days when you may want to easily change layers.
customer_reviews.author: Kay W

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. When I first received them
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. When I first received them, I did not think that they could possibly fit, but they did. They looked so tiny, and I did not think they could possibly fit my hips. Measurements are 33-26-39, and an athletic 140 lbs. Bought these for an upcoming Mud Run in late October, and these worked out perfectly. EXTREMELY DURABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Smudge

customer_reviews.title: never would have thought they'd fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews and someone stated that they will look like there is no way you will fit in them, but you will! Because when I pulled them out I was thinking -- oh heck no! There is NO WAY! but sure enough! They fit! I used them for kayaking about 2 weeks ago, water was splashing on me, never felt it and I remained warm and dry! SO glad I got these ... now I can extend the season a little bit longer!!
customer_reviews.author: LilCarol

customer_reviews.title: Great pants for Kayaking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a kayak trip in New Zealand. The weather forecast was on the cool side, roughly in the low to mid 60's, and despite having a spray skirt, I always seem to get soaked, cold, and uncomfortable. As it turned out, the weather was mid 70's, but I was so happy to have worn these pants, as I remained totally dry, despite water getting inside the kayak, warm (not hot), and comfortable. As well, I was also able to pull the pant leg up to my knee to wade in and out of the kayak. These fit true to size, feel great, and are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Grandie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and soft we like them
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft we like no complaints if anything changes will update you We really like these pants and order a large the large came in very smooth on the inside. we had ordered the extra large It was really rough on the inside legs not sure why possibly some manufacturing issue. We've ordered a few of these along with the tops and have had no problems with any of them except this one . Yes this is a good product and we definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but you should know....
customer_reviews.text: Best reviews a very accurate and this is an excellent product: The one star down side is more based on you fit requirements and needs. The material is super stretchy and wil fit long legs. My legs are short so the material bunches up at the end of legs holding a large volumes of water so a stiffer material product may be better for high speed water sports. Very flexible for surfing but lots of water is going to rush in and cool you down when crashing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2", 190#. Originally ordered XXL--too big. Exchanged for XL--fits perfectly. I use them for kayaking in the spring and fall to extend my season and works well for my use. A little thin if you're going to be immersed for long periods. It comes up higher in back than front, which is a nice feature. Also has some grippy material on the seat (exterior) which is a nice feature. Good product and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Nice athletic fit without being too tight. I paddle on the Great Lakes and conditions change quickly from day to day especially in Spring and Fall. I like that these are nice and warm for early Fall and late Spring but in colder conditions you could throw a pair of paddling pants over them and be unstoppable in the coldest conditions imaginable.
customer_reviews.author: S. in MI

customer_reviews.title: 5'9" Male, 30 waistline: Small fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, fits quite well and seems like it will allow for a good range of motion. Will update after a very cold mud run.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bell

customer_reviews.title: These hold up well in clorinated water and keep me warm.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I am small and love to swim, but was not able to be in an 86 degree pool without shivering. One of the managers suggested I purchase a pair of these pants. I ve been using them 3 times per week for 1-2 hours in clorinated water for about 2 months. So far, they are not showing any signs of wear. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: redrover

customer_reviews.title: Love love love  these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sent back 3 different models of neoprene pants before finding these. You won't find any more comfortable than these are!! They're pricey but worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Torres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for layering, or just keeping warm
customer_reviews.text: I am a female surfer, 5'7", 120lbs. so I purchased the xs . I love the fit, and the draw string allows for minor changes at the waist. The pants fit well and keep their shape in the water.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Very comfortable. I used it to dive in 80F temperature and did not feel cold at all. It was easy fold to travel with and did not take up much space in my carry on. I am 5' 2" so it is a bit long, but it just folded the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Order by waist size
customer_reviews.text: I searched the Internet trying to figure out how to order this to fit a women. I ordered by waist size and I'm happy with the fit. I could've gone with the XS, but I wanted room to layer if I get cold. They are very stretchy and easy to put on. I'm using them for scuba diving.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Time to snorkle:)
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase,as i am 5'11" I was a bit worried it would be too short,but no,its perfect,I have worn it 3 times out in the ocean on a catamaran,perfect! Very well made,comfortable,arrived on time,total satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Donna☆

customer_reviews.title: Love these pants!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pants! It is great that the pants are higher in the back to fill that gap between pants and vest! Definitely purchase these pants. I am a female, 5'5", 145lbs and the Large is a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: LTC Barb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pants for PWC (Jet Ski) Riding
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year of use: To me, these pants are fantastic for PWC (Jet Ski) riding in moderate or warmer conditions (outside temperatures and water temperatures). For people, who do not get cold easily, even cooler conditions might work. The pants are very flexible and fit snug (good neoprene fit). Easy to get in and out. They hold up well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: HWL

customer_reviews.title: Using for kayak fishing
customer_reviews.text: Well made and true to size. Using while kayaking went the temperature is in the 40-50's. Thick enough to be warm but not too thick to allow free movement.
customer_reviews.author: Dan PCFL

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold water
customer_reviews.text: I used this in conjunction with a thick wetsuit for cold-water swimming in water below 50 degrees throughout last winter. This along with a hooded scuba diving bib and the XSPAN shirt really helps keep the body temperature at an acceptable level. It can also be used by itself as a sunblock during warmer weathers, so it's a great year-round item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'8" 140lbs and the medium is perfect fit. They are not heavy weight
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for to wear for paddling my inflatable kayak. I am 5'8" 140lbs and the medium is perfect fit. They are not heavy weight, very comfortable that allow good movement.
customer_reviews.author: sarah schaab

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: NeoSport Wetsuits XSPAN pants, black: I use this for sun protection and windbreaker when i go surfing and windsurfing. Just what i need. No problems with movement.
customer_reviews.author: Covalent crema

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, easy on-off, good value
customer_reviews.text: These are great for SUP or kayak in cool weather. Lightweight and very easy to get on and off. I am 5'4" 120lbs and wear a size 4, the X-Small fit perfect. NOT for cold water or really cold weather, but perfect for wind and cool weather. Easy to swim in.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Best Exposure Wear for Tropical Waters!!!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair of these, but wanted a second pair! I hope they never stop making them ... best exposure wear for tropical waters!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol C  Blickenstorfer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, a bit too long though
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, a bit too long though. The material is not very thick, very stretchy and easy to pull on. I am 5'4", 140 lb, wear bottoms size 8-10, and got a medium. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: NeoSport Pants Rock!
customer_reviews.text: Less bulky than a full wet suit and extremely comfortable. Could have taken a medium despite an athletic build for reference. Definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: mae29

customer_reviews.title: Does what I want for the right price. Got ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what I want for the right price. Got in the cooler water and it kept me dry. With warmer leggings underneath I was comfy and dry. I use this to just get into water for a limited time so I can get onto and off of my water water bike.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Scuba Diving
customer_reviews.text: Great neoprene pants! Very stretchy and comfortable. Great to layer with rash guard. Offers thermo protection and protects against stings and bumps with the reef. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: fits to size and works well for what it is ...
customer_reviews.text: fits to size and works well for what it is...seems to be well made and no problems after 3xs using in mountain rivers fly fishing...
customer_reviews.author: Pantero

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy, soft, and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. I wear them for stand up paddle boarding in Alaska in summer. I'm a woman 5'8" and 160 lb, 39" hips, and I got the mens large and am so happy. They are really stretchy and don't cut off circulation like other neoprene i've worn, but stay snug enough to be active and I forget I have them on. I also noticed when I sit on board in cold water puddle - my bottom stays dry. I like that they are are high waisted and stay put and do not ride down. They fit nicely under my sport dress and I can wear these as warm running/hiking tights too.
customer_reviews.author: FreeSpiritWear

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast. Size chart was right on for my size which is XS. Have wore them three time and love them for kayaking keeping my legs dry from water splashing and paddle drip. Plus working as a wet suit should for wading through shallow rapids. They also dry quickly. Great product at a good price....thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far the pants fit well and keep the body heat in pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Jphockeyfan

customer_reviews.title: Liberal sizing.
customer_reviews.text: These have great stretch and one size will fit many body types.
customer_reviews.author: Shari C

customer_reviews.title: Pants Material is Only 1.5MM Thick
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice of the ad specified the material thickness for the pants. I just bought both the NeoSport XSPAN jacket and pants. Where the jacket is 3MM thick on the torso and 2MM thick on the sleeves (3/2) ... the NeoSport XSPAN pants are only 1.5MM thick. I'm not sure how this qualifies as a 'wetsuit' because it's certainly not going to do much to keep you very warm.
customer_reviews.author: GulfBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and feeling product and very stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Have not hit the water yet with mine because I ordered too small. My advice? Men, measure your waist with a sewing (fabric) measuring tape and then order...don't use your pant waist size. Example, I wear a 34 waist slack, ordered a large which showed 35-37 inch waist in chart and still a bit small for my gut...too much See's candy I guess. Am returning them for an XL. The large sizes length however was plenty long for me and I'm 6' 1". Nice looking and feeling product though and very stretchy. I'm looking forward to doing some surf fishing in these.
customer_reviews.author: stonehenge7

customer_reviews.title: They seem good. I am 5' 9"
customer_reviews.text: They seem good. I am 5' 9", 135 lbs. An XS fits but is too short. Will see if a S is better.
customer_reviews.author: Helga

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for paddleboarding. Very stretchy and fit men and women. I am 5'5" and 140 lbs, the small fit me perfectly. My husband is 6' and 170 lbs. The medium fit him great. We both love them.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the NeoSport product. The size is perfect. Will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MarieLee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and are super comfortable. I am a 32 waist and I went with the small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my favorite pants,thank you, works great!!!! I will buy more soon
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rossi

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: nice on days when it's not terribly cold, but don't want to wear a full wet suit. easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Puluking

customer_reviews.title: Great for under wetsuits!
customer_reviews.text: very easy to slide on and off... very comfortable in and out of water... warm when layered under wetsuit! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Great for outrigging
customer_reviews.text: Pants are exactly what I needed for outrigging. I can stay warm. The fit was great
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: size fits great - cant wait to try these out.
customer_reviews.author: Buywhenineed

customer_reviews.title: Nice warming wetsuit pants
customer_reviews.text: Nice warming wetsuit pants, however the reference size was wrong, I should have gotten Large (I am 6' and 190 lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Andre Pingol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for cool weather splash protection for those of us trying to prolong the season.
customer_reviews.author: inVT

customer_reviews.title: Large was really large
customer_reviews.text: Like this product, but the large was way too large. I returned and got a medium which fit well. I was tempted to order a small because of the extreme difference, but the medium worked well. I would typically order a medium, but had read some reviews that said it ran small, that was not the case for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely light weight, which is what I wanted. I got them for working out after a pulled leg muscle, to keep my legs from tightening up. Works good for that...I'm sure they work well in water too, but haven't used it for that...overall, very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Like this pants so much
customer_reviews.text: Like this pants so much, I am around 5' 6" high, 1120 pound, and the S size is perfect to me.
customer_reviews.author: Moon26

customer_reviews.title: Good material and well made
customer_reviews.text: This Pants is well made from a good quality of material. It is 1.5mm thick material. I bought about a month ago and used for swimming and jet ski. I'm happy with the purchase and overall quality of product.
customer_reviews.author: Yusry

customer_reviews.title: I like to go in with him to keep him in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so I can keep taking my lab to swim, even as it gets colder. I like to go in with him to keep him in the water, walking and swimming for physical therapy, these are great, I don't feel the cold water, even though I get wet. I do not know why they picture them as if they have feet, they do not.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: What a great alternative to waders
customer_reviews.text: What a great alternative to waders while fishing cold fast water. Long walk fishing days are much easier in these neoprene pants.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Chobotiuk

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i Bought The Small As I Am Narrow Through The HIps Yet Very Busty. One Piece Suits Don't Work For Me.. This Was Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me warm for wintertime swimming. Very comfortable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: happy campers

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Cold water hurts my knees so I decided to try half a wet suit. It worked just as I had hoped. No pain and I was able to spend as much time as I wanted in the ocean. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pants. They fit great and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: patricia lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he absolutely loved the fit and feel!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very useful product. Well made and lives up to its description. Very sturdy product that is well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 5-star rating as I find the NeoSport XSPAN pants is very well made and of high quality. Looks very sleek too. Medium size fits me very well - I'm 1.64m and weighs 61kg. Like the barrel cinch cord which makes it super easy to tighten and loosen the pants. Very comfortable. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what I was looking for at the right price
customer_reviews.author: SEARBEE

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Thin, very stretchy neoprene. Very comfortable for summer swimming and boarding in central california. Labeled as 1.5mm but are thinner (and stretchier) than my friends Dive and Sail 1/5's. Perfect fit for my 32 waist and 33 inseam.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used the pants last week on my Jet Ski, great comfort ! Easy to clean, great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Olli

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit pants- used for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: These are just right for kayaking when its not quite warm enough. I'm a size 10 and got a size large in this. Quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Exclellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Just what I wanted for kayaking and surf fishing. Bought another for my husband - after trying mine he was impressed too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ildiko Mccann

customer_reviews.title: don't go by sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how well these work as my son was not able to get into them. According to the chart, at 130 lb, 5'8" and 30 inch waist, he is a size small, but the size small pants were tiny. Also the package, which would have fit in a size 5 padded mailer (10.5"X 15") was sent in an insanely huge cardboard box (21" X 37"X 3.5")!!!!! A real hassel to repackage and return.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Stravato

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SIZE CHART FOR THIS ITEM - see below for right one
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has put up the wrong size chart for this item. These pants are unisex. They are NOT men's. We ordered the Medium for my husband, based on Amazon's size chart, and they are barely big enough (or long enough) for a size 8 woman. The CORRECT size chart can be found at scuba.com under neosports. Come on Amazon, get it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazo

product_meta.title: Neo-Sport Wetsuit Pants XSPAN super stretch 1.5mm neoprene. UNISEX design, Watersports, Swimming, Obstacle, Mud Racing, SCUBA, Surf, SUP, Personal Watercraft
product_meta.description:
Exclusive XSPAN material - Ultra Soft and Comfortable - 250% 4-Way Super Stretch foam neoprene.

Made with 100 percent, exclusive, XSPAN foam neoprene, the XSPAN Pants from NeoSports offer complete freedom of movement in the water and anatomical construction for total comfort. The 250 percent, 4-way super stretch XSPAN is bonded with flatlock stitching for extra durability and an ultra-smooth face even at the seams. The pants feature an extended lumbar to ensure full coverage in the water and have a reinforced seat for long term durability at the highest wearing area. Finally, an off centered barrel cinch shock cord at the waist ensures a secure, custom fit.

 Key Features:

 * 100 percent XSPAN construction: Soft and comfortable foam neoprene offers 250 percent, 4-way super stretch.
 * Bomb-proof flatlock stitching: for a smooth interior and exterior surface to ensure comfort and durability.
 * Reinforced screened seat area: helps provide a long life to a traditional high wear area and to help reduce slippage.
 * Anatomical design with extended lumbar: provides maximum coverage while in use.
 * Off centered barrel cinch shock cord: ensures the best fit.

Men's Size Specifications SizeX SmallSmallMediumLargeX LargeXX Large3X Large Chest34 to 38 inches36 to 38 inches38 to 40 inches40 to 42 inches42 to 44 inches44 to 46 inches46 to 48 inches Waist29 to 31 inches31 to 33 inches33 to 35 inches35 to 37 inches37 to 39 inches39 to 41 inches41 to 44 inches Weight125 to 135 pounds135 to 150 pounds150 to 170 pounds170 to 190 pounds190 to 210 pounds210 to 230 pounds230 to 250 pounds Height5 feet, 6 inches5 feet, 8 inches5 feet, 10 inches5 feet, 11 inches6 feet6 feet, 1 inch6 feet, 2 inches
feature_bullets: Constructed from 250%, 4 way stretch XSPAN (super stretch neoprene)
Flatlock seams for maximum comfort and durability
Pant seat area is reinforced with flexible thermal bonded coating
Anatomical design with extended lumbar for maximum coverage and warmth while in use
Off centered barrel cinch shock cord ensures the best fit and comfort when used with Kayaks and SUP's
Popular for use in obstacle course competitions, where you encounter mud, water and slime
